48 namespace Tapi
49 {
50 class ServiceClient : public TapiClient
51 {
52 public:
53  // Constructor/Destructor
54  ServiceClient(ros::NodeHandle *nh, std::string nodename = "");
55  ~ServiceClient();
56 
57  // Public member functions
58  // Templated functions
59  template <typename T>
60  ros::ServiceClient **AddFeature(std::string featurename = "")
61  {
62  ros::ServiceClientOptions opt;
63  ros::M_string empty;
64  ros::ServiceClient *client = 0;
65  std::string featureUUID = getNextFeatureUUID();
66  std::string temptopic = "/Tapi/" + uuid + "/" + featureUUID;
67  opt.init<T>(temptopic, false, empty);
68  ros::ServiceClient **clientptr = 0;
69  std::pair<ros::ServiceClientOptions, ros::ServiceClient *> newEntry;
70  newEntry = std::make_pair(opt, client);
71  clients.push_back(newEntry);
72  tapi_lib::Feature feature;
73  ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions temp;
74  temp = ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions::create<T>("", NULL, ros::VoidPtr(), NULL);
75  std::string temp2 = temp.datatype;
76  feature.FeatureType = temp2;
77  feature.Name = featurename;
78  feature.UUID = featureUUID;
79  featureMsgs.push_back(feature);
80  clientptr = &clients.at(clients.size() - 1).second;
81  connect();
82  return clientptr;
83  }
84 
85 private:
86  // Private member functions
87  void readConfigMsg(const tapi_lib::Connection::ConstPtr &msg);
88 
89  // Private member variables
90  std::vector<std::pair<ros::ServiceClientOptions, ros::ServiceClient *>> clients;
91  ros::Subscriber configSub;
92  ros::NodeHandle *nh;
93  std::string nodename;
94  std::string serviceName;
95 };
96 }
